Module org.tquadrat.foundation.config
Package org.tquadrat.foundation.config.internal

Class UsageBuilder

java.lang.Object
org.tquadrat.foundation.config.internal.UsageBuilder
@ClassVersion(sourceVersion="$Id: UsageBuilder.java 896 2021-04-05 20:25:33Z tquadrat $") @API(status=INTERNAL, since="0.0.1") public class UsageBuilder extends Object
Builds the usage message that will be printed to the console (or wherever) in case help is requested on the command line, or an invalid option or argument is provided on it.
Author:
Thomas Thrien (thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org)
Version:
$Id: UsageBuilder.java 896 2021-04-05 20:25:33Z tquadrat $
Since:
0.0.1

      Ensures that the left and the right part have the same number of entries and that the lines have the same length.
